NFQL

More Resolved Issues

17 June 2012

Issue #68 →

The engine now does NOT segfault when srcaddr = dstaddr is provided at the grouper stage. An example query script has been provided to confirm this that finds all the TCP sessions between 2 endpoints. A test case for this query on both the traces has also been provided.

Issue #84 →

Simpler source organization by moving the headers from include/ to src/.

Issue #93 →

Previously 3/4 queries did not return any results on the example trace file. Therefore a new larger trace has been added at examples/. All the queries give results on this trace. Additional tcp-session, dns and mdns queries have also been added in scripts/queries/

Issue #94 →

Removed all trailing whitespaces from sources and headers

Issue #95 →

There was apparantely a segmentation fault when no grouper rules were defined. This was due to an attempt to free sorted/unique recordset pointers which are not allocated when no grouper rules are defined.
